verification.verifyABNErrorMessage: Please enter an ABN up to 11 characters long and contains only numerical characters.

verification.verifyUserAccountNumberBUSErrorMessage: The number entered belongs to an AGL Small Business Account, please visit the small business sign-up page to continue with your request.
verification.verifyUserAccountNumberCNIErrorMessage: Unfortunately due to your account type you are unable to use this service. If you wish to discuss further please contact AGL on 1300 793 477.
verification.verifyUserAccountNumberErrorMessage: Please enter a valid AGL Account Number and click Next to proceed.

verification.verifyUserAccountNumberVerifyErrorMessag: We are unable to verify the account number entered. Please call AGL 24/7 on 1800 831 028 for further assistance.
verification.verifyUserAccountNumberVerifyRetryMessag: We are unable to verify the account number entered. Please check the number on your bill and try again.

verification.verifyUserAdditionalInfoNoEmail: We notice your email address is missing from our records
